definition[0]: a book, play, piece of music etc that someone has written recently
example[0]: the latest offering from Nanci Griffith
definition[1]: something that is given to God
definition[2]: something that is given as a present to please someone
definition[3]: a product or service sold by a company, or a number of these considered as a group
example[1]: Like most new high-tech products when they first hit the market, its latest offering (=its most recent product) won’t be cheap.
example[2]: The company broadened its offering (=made more products available) of home health-care products.
definition[4]: an occasion when shares, bonds etc are made available for sale, or the amount involved
example[3]: The bank plans to raise $1.25 billion in a stock offering later this month.
example[4]: Proceeds of the share offering will be used to reduce the company’s debt.
